attributes.action: Nail Salons should show certificate's and qualifications
attributes.additional_details:
Over the last 2 years we have been campaigning for Nail Salons and Mobile Nail Technicians to be qualified.
If this isn't possible Nail Salons, Bars and mobile nail technicians should have their qualifications clearly visible or accessible as well as insurance documents.

We have seen horror stories of Nails that have been damaged by unqualified Nail Technicians
